title: Guided Participatory Instructional Design for Integrating Mobile Technology-Based Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Cultivating real-life problem-solving skills through mobile technology-based learning activities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve everyday mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy using mobile apps
Learners can collaboratively design and share mobile-based math learning materials at least twice with peers
Learners can actively participate in math learning communities through guided engagement methods at least three times

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
